Content:: Huso is a genus of large sturgeons from Eurasia. It contains two species, both of which are critically endangered: Recent data indicate a polyphyletic origin of the genus Huso, and it is suggested that the two Huso species should be included in the genus Acipenser.[4][5][6]   This order Acipenseriformes (Sturgeon and Paddlefish) related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
